Philipp Slusallek Philipp Slusallek is Scientific Director at the German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI), where he is leading the research area âAgents and Simulated Realityâ since 2008. At Saarland University he has been a full professor for Computer Graphics since 1999. Philipp Slusallek has done pioneering work in the areas of real-time ray tracing and lighting simulation, high-performance graphics hardware and software, massive model visualization, 3D Internet technology, distributed media applications, and novel 3D tomographic reconstructions.
